DOC.brief_summary: The determination of reference values is a necessary basis for research and clinical routine testing for pneumococci antibodies
DOC.brief_title: Generation of Standard Laboratory Values for Pneumococci Antibodies
DOC.detailed_description: This study is meant to determine specific pneumococcal antibodies stratified for age. The investigators also correlate our assay with the results from a commercially available pneumococcal screening ELISA (iGG1 and IgG2) in order to facilitate a screening for immunodeficiency, and to monitor the success of a performed immunization
DOC.criteria: Subjects undergoing elective surgery Chronic illness condition, Immunodeficiency
